tool_description: Pulls JSON data from the onion articles
name: The Onion Api
title: The Onion Api

api_list.name: Latest Headlines
api_list.description: Get the latest news headlines from the The Onion.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-onion-api.p.rapidapi.com/headlines"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-onion-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-onion-api.p.rapidapi.com/headlines"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-onion-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
